title: Jakob17's Art Cavern

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]

[[module CSS]]
 

 
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:400,900|PT+Mono|Poppins:600,800');
 

 
:root {

    --header-title: "Jakob17's Art Cavern";
    --header-subtitle: "artpage of curiosity";

[[/module]]




[[=]]
+ Hello there!
[[/=]]

This page is filled with art that can be described as Good, Cursed, or Cool but you'll be the Judge so shall stumble in.

[[tabview]]
[[tab SCPs]]

Pictures of the Varies Anomalies and or Events surrounding said anomalies.

[[=]]

+++ - [[[SCP-662]]]/[[[SCP-113]]] - Mrs.Deeds
[[collapsible show="+ Show image" hide="- Hide image"]]
[[image 662]]
Yes I know the stone is not here but please give me a better explanation, I'll wait
[[/collapsible]]

+++ - [[[SCP-4795]]] - Feathered F(r)iends-
[[collapsible show="+ Show image" hide="- Hide image"]]
[[image 4795]]
This was a gift for [[*user Lt Flops]] for the Art Exchange
[[/collapsible]]

+++ - [[[SCP-5366]]] - Until death do us part and every day after -
[[collapsible show="+ Show image" hide="- Hide image"]]
[[image 5366]]
I'm not proud of this one I don't say this because it's bad because it makes me feel sick in a good way
[[/collapsible]]

[[/=]]





[[/tab]]
[[tab Padoru]]

Christmas the Time of Giving so I'm giving away some Padorus of different Authors or researchers
